verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> No Longer <S%G3371><s%> Enduring, <S%G4722><s%> We Thought Good <S%G2106><s%> To Be Left <S%G2641><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Athens <S%G116><s%> Alone, <S%G3441><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Sent <S%G3992><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Servant <S%G1249><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fellow Worker <S%G4904><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Establish <S%G4741><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Encourage <S%G3870><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Your Faith <S%G5216><s%>

That <S%G3588><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> Be Moved <S%G4525><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2347><s%> Theses Tribulations <S%G3778><s%> <S%G846><s%> For Yourselves <S%G1063><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> We Are Set; <S%G2749><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Also, <S%G1063><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> <S%G1510><s%> We Told Beforehand <S%G4302><s%> <S%G5213><s%> You <S%G3754><s%> We Are About <S%G3195><s%> To Suffer Tribulation, <S%G2346><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Know. <S%G1492><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> No Longer <S%G3371><s%> Enduring, <S%G4722><s%> Sent <S%G3992><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Your Faith, <S%G5216><s%> Lest Perhaps <S%G3381><s%> Did Tempt <S%G3985><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Tempts, <S%G3985><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G1519><s%> Void <S%G2756><s%> Should Become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2873><s%> Our Labour. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G737><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Announced Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> To Us Of <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Your, <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> Remembrance <S%G3417><s%> Of Us <S%G2257><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Always, <S%G3842><s%> Longing <S%G1971><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> To See, <S%G1492><s%> Even As <S%G2509><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> You : <S%G5209><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> We Were Encouraged, <S%G3870><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> ' As To <S%G1909><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Necessity <S%G318><s%> Our, <S%G2257><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5216><s%> Your Faith, <S%G4102><s%>
Because <S%G3754><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> We Live <S%G2198><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Should Stand Fast <S%G4739><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> For What <S%G1063><s%> Thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> Are We Able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God <S%G2316><s%> To Render <S%G467><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Wherewith <S%G3739><s%> We Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> ' On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Our God, <S%G2257><s%>

Night <S%G3571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G5228><s%> Exceedingly <S%G4057><s%> Beseeching <S%G1189><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Face, <S%G4383><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Perfect <S%G2675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The Things Lacking <S%G5303><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Faith <S%G4102><s%> Your? <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G5209><s%> But You <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> May Take To Exceed <S%G4121><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Abound <S%G4052><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Love <S%G26><s%> Toward <S%G1519><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Toward <S%G1519><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> Even As <S%G2509><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Toward <S%G1519><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%>

For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Establish <S%G4741><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hearts <S%G2588><s%> Blameless <S%G273><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Holiness <S%G42><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Our, <S%G2257><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G40><s%> His Saints. <S%G846><s%>
